queries.sql: SELECT groupingCol, SKEWNESS(val), KURTOSIS(val) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY groupingCol
SELECT SKEWNESS(val), KURTOSIS(val) FROM {tbl} WHERE groupingCol='a'
SELECT t1.groupingCol, SKEWNESS(t1.val + t2.val), KURTOSIS(t1.val + t2.val) FROM {tbl} AS t1 LEFT JOIN {tbl2} AS t2 USING (partitionCol) GROUP BY t1.groupingCol
SELECT groupingCol, COVARPOP(val, val), COVARSAMP(val, val), VARPOP(val), VARSAMP(val), STDDEVPOP(val), STDDEVSAMP(val) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY groupingCol
queries.h2Sql: SELECT groupingCol, COVAR_POP(val, val), COVAR_SAMP(val, val), VAR_POP(val), VAR_SAMP(val), STDDEV_POP(val), STDDEV_SAMP(val) FROM {tbl} GROUP BY groupingCol

queries.sql: SELECT COVARPOP(val, val), COVARSAMP(val, val), VARPOP(val), VARSAMP(val), STDDEVPOP(val), STDDEVSAMP(val) FROM {tbl} WHERE groupingCol='a'

queries.sql: SELECT t1.groupingCol, COVARPOP(t1.val, t2.val), COVARSAMP(t1.val, t2.val), VARPOP(t1.val + t2.val), VARSAMP(t1.val + t2.val), STDDEVPOP(t1.val + t2.val), STDDEVSAMP(t1.val + t2.val) FROM {tbl} AS t1 LEFT JOIN {tbl2} AS t2 USING (partitionCol) GROUP BY t1.groupingCol

queries.comments: standard name with underscore creates un-supported function from agg-reduce-function calcite rule
